description.p: An adapter for Thule OutRide 561 to enable transport of bikes with 15x110 mm boost thru axles
Simply remove the existing axle adapter and replace with this one in 2 minutes.
Anodised black for wear and corrosion resistance
Designed by Bicycle Service Centre in the UK
An adapter for Thule OutRide 561 to enable transport of bikes with 12x100 mm thru axles
Simply remove the existing axle adapter and replace with this one in 2 minutes.
Anodised black for wear and corrosion resistance
Designed by Bicycle Service Centre in the UK
Two better than OEM quality ABEC 5 bearings for BB30, BB30A and BBright Direct Fit
We also sell a higher spec ceramic hybrid version - please see our other listings
Bicycle Service Centre Hybrid Ceramic BB30 / BB30A / BBright Bearings (61806-2RS)
Two better than OEM quality ABEC 3 bearings for BB30, BB30A and BBright Direct Fit Bearings are 6806 / 61806 2RS 30mm x 42mm x 7mm
Hybrid Ceramic - Stainless steel race with Silicon Nitride (Si3N4) ball bearings
In ideal conditions, hybrid ceramic bearings will last 5-20 times longer than steel alternatives
